Module com.game.comp2042_cw_hcyot1
Package com.game.comp2042_cw_hcyot1.game

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
com.game.comp2042_cw_hcyot1.game.GameModel
public class GameModel extends Object
Handles Ball-Player-Wall interaction, but leaves as much detail about the levels and their organisation and state to wallHandler as possible. Anything that needs to be shown on screen is handled by controller, to achieve separation of concerns.
See Also:
  • GameView
  • GameController

    • ballEnd

      public boolean ballEnd()
      Returns:
      If the balls ran out (i.e. ballCount == 0), then return true, otherwise return false.

      public boolean hasLevel()

      If the game is running, return true, otherwise return false.

    • isDone

      public boolean isDone()
      Returns:
      Ask wallHandler if the current level is done, if it is, return true, otherwise return false.
